name: NO MANS LAND / Windows
description:
The Story:

It´s the future ! To be exact, it is so far into the future that the human species invented faster than light travel, got into a galactic war with itself and bombed itself into a new dark age. This is where the actual story begins. You are Nobody (that´s his name), a little thief that got his hands on a treasure map. Unfortunately, he stole it from someone very dangerous and now he is being tracked by some very dangerous people. The only option Nobody sees is to find the treasure, grab some of it, and "piss off".

Attention: If you press "ESC", the game shuts down. You can only load from the main menu, so you have to restart the app to access that.

Disclaimer: I know this game is not in english and i dont know if it ever will be. If there is a big demand for it i might think about it, but for now it stays like this. 

A Point&Click Adventure i made for my finals.  It took about 3 months to create and is my first game so far. I wrote, planed, drew and animated everything you see in this game. You can find the assets,concepts and more over here on my Deviantart (also old stuff)  and on my Instagram .

The music was done by my friend "Paul Turowski". You can find more of his stuff on his Spotify

The Programming was done by my friend "Hendrik"
